title: Which shifts reduce quantity at same price

content.question: The graph above shows the supply and demand curves for a particular brand of computers. In 1988, 10,000 computers were sold for $1,000 each, but in 1989, 9,000 computers were sold for $1,000 each. Which of the following changes in the supply and demand curves could most likely have caused this change?

choices.label: Demand Curve Supply Curve Shift right Shift right
Demand Curve Supply Curve Shift right Shift left
Demand Curve Supply Curve No change Shift left
Demand Curve Supply Curve Shift left Shift left
Demand Curve Supply Curve Shift left No change

content.answer: Demand Curve Supply Curve Shift left Shift left

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
